title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces Blue Broker as Latest Approved Member

content.rendered:
February 1st, 2018, leading external dispute resolution (EDR) organization, Financial Commission, catering to the financial services industry and operated by FinaCom PLC, today announces Blue Broker as its newest approved Member.

Blue Broker status as an A-category Member of the Financial Commission took effect on January 29, 2018, following the approval of its membership application by Financial Commission, thus allowing the company and its customers access to a wide range of services and membership benefits including, but not limited to, protection for up to €20,000 per submitted complaint, backed by the Financial Commission’s compensation fund.

Financial Commission provides brokerages and their customers with an unbiased 3rd party mediation platform that helps resolve complaints in instances when parties are unable to directly come to an agreement over disputes.

For approved members and their clients participating in CFDs, foreign exchange (forex) and cryptocurrency markets, Financial Commission helps facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution process than through typical regulatory channels such as arbitration or local court systems.

Blue Broker joins a diverse range of brokerages and independent services providers (ISPs) that utilise the services of the Financial Commission and as part of their commitment to their clients while upholding membership requirements.

About Blue Broker

Blue Broker is a multi-asset trading platform, built for next-generation assets and securities. Lighting fast highly secure platform with all the trading tools needed to for clients’ favorite trading strategies. With company’s revolutionary platform, traders can take advantage of market opportunities in a variety of major Crypto classes. Blue Broker offers fast execution, fast support, and a unique personal experience to allow you to trade the Crypto markets around the clock with ease.

Blue Broker offers Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other leading Crypto asset liquidity for traders seeking the ability to achieve true liquid market access to leading Crypto Exchanges.

For more information please contact Blue Broker at support@bluebroker.com

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org
